```{r}
inhosp.delirium <- inhosp %>%
  select("vddrs", "vdmdas", "vdcamseveritylf")

drs.lim <- c(0, 30)
drs.seq <- seq(0, 30, by = 5)
mdas.lim <- c(0, 25)
mdas.seq <- seq(0, 25, by = 5)
cam.lim <- c(0, 20)
cam.seq <- seq(0, 20, by = 5)
cor.drs.mdas <- with(inhosp.delirium, cor(vddrs, vdmdas, use="complete.obs"))
cor.drs.cam <- with(inhosp.delirium, cor(vddrs, vdcamseveritylf, use="complete.obs"))
cor.cam.mdas <- with(inhosp.delirium, cor(vdcamseveritylf, vdmdas, use="complete.obs"))
text.drs.mdas <- paste("r = ", round(cor.drs.mdas, 2))
text.drs.cam <- paste("r = ", round(cor.drs.cam, 2))
text.cam.mdas <- paste("r = ", round(cor.cam.mdas, 2))

plot1 <- ggplot(inhosp.delirium, aes(x = vddrs , y = vddrs)) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = drs.lim, breaks = drs.seq) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = drs.lim, breaks = drs.seq)
plot2 <- ggplot(inhosp.delirium, aes(x = vdmdas , y = vddrs)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = mdas.lim, breaks = mdas.seq) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = drs.lim, breaks = drs.seq) + 
  annotate("text", x = 20, y = 5, label = text.drs.mdas)
plot3 <- ggplot(inhosp.delirium, aes(x = vdcamseveritylf, y = vddrs)) +
  geom_point()+
  scale_x_continuous(limits = cam.lim, breaks = cam.seq) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = drs.lim, breaks = drs.seq) + 
  annotate("text", x = 17, y = 5, label = text.drs.cam)
plot4 <- ggplot(inhosp.delirium, aes(x = vddrs, y = vdmdas)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = drs.lim, breaks = drs.seq) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = mdas.lim, breaks = mdas.seq) + 
  annotate("text", x = 25, y = 5, label = text.drs.mdas)
plot5 <- ggplot(inhosp.delirium, aes(x = vdmdas , y = vdmdas)) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = mdas.lim, breaks = mdas.seq) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = mdas.lim, breaks = mdas.seq)
plot6 <- ggplot(inhosp.delirium, aes(x = vdcamseveritylf, y = vdmdas)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = cam.lim, breaks = cam.seq) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = mdas.lim, breaks = mdas.seq) + 
  annotate("text", x = 17, y = 5, label = text.cam.mdas)
plot7 <- ggplot(inhosp.delirium, aes(x = vddrs, y = vdcamseveritylf)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = drs.lim, breaks = drs.seq) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = cam.lim, breaks = cam.seq) + 
  annotate("text", x = 25, y = 3, label = text.drs.cam)
plot8 <- ggplot(inhosp.delirium, aes(x = vdmdas, y = vdcamseveritylf)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = mdas.lim, breaks = mdas.seq) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = cam.lim, breaks = cam.seq) + 
  annotate("text", x = 20, y = 3, label = text.cam.mdas)
plot9 <- ggplot(inhosp.delirium, aes(x = vdcamseveritylf , y = vdcamseveritylf)) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = cam.lim, breaks = cam.seq) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = cam.lim, breaks = cam.seq)



ggmatrix(list(plot1, plot2, plot3, plot4, plot5, plot6, plot7, plot8, plot9), 
         nrow = 3, ncol = 3,
         xAxisLabels = c("DRS", "MDAS", "CAM-S"), 
         yAxisLabels = c("DRS", "MDAS", "CAM-S"))

```
